title: UIC HCI — Design. Experience. Change.
text: To support individual and social activities and improve everyday life, we design, build, and evaluate ubiquitous computing technologies. Our design deeply draws from our research on how people work, play, and communicate in day-to-day life.
Poster accepted at the Workgroup on Interactive Systems in Healthcare (WISH) at CHI'19. Congrats, Pantea!
Three Late Breaking Work papers accepted at CHI'19. Congrats Harish, Pantea, Tengteng, and Hasti!
myCityMeter received best poster honorable mention (top 3 out of  ~200) at UbiComp'18.
myPHA project with Barbara, Andy, Richard, and colleagues just funded by NIH.
